text:
[Verse]
Sunshine in my eyes
Laughter fills the sky
Walking hand in hand
Barefoot in the sand

[Verse 2]
Ice cream melting fast
Moments made to last
Poolside without care
Love is in the air

[Chorus]
Summer dreams come true
In the sky so blue
Every day just fine
You and me combine

[Verse 3]
Stars light up the night
Everything feels right
Dancing till we fall
Echoes down the hall

[Bridge]
Life feels like a breeze
Hearts are at ease
Endless sunny days
Lost in a warm haze

[Verse 4]
Counting waves that crash
Time goes by so fast
Holding onto you
Wish this never flew
title: Summer Dreams
